Name: Proxmox Deploy LXC Container
Description:
Creates a new Proxmox LXC container using the Proxmox API.

Requires a Proxmox [API token](https://pve.proxmox.com/wiki/Proxmox_VE_API#API_Tokens) to authenticate to the Proxmox Server/Cluster

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.Host
Parameters.Label: Proxmox Host
Parameters.HelpText: The hostname or IP address of the Proxmox cluster/host

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.User
Parameters.Label: Proxmox User Account
Parameters.HelpText: The Proxmox user account associated with the api token.

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.Node
Parameters.Label: Proxmox Node
Parameters.HelpText: The Proxmox node in the cluster.

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.TokenID
Parameters.Label: Proxmox Token ID
Parameters.HelpText: This is token id that was used to create an API token in proxmox.

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.LXC.VMID
Parameters.Label: LXC VM ID
Parameters.HelpText: The new VMID for the new LXC container default is -1 to find the next ID

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.LXC.OSTemplate
Parameters.Label: LXC OS Template
Parameters.HelpText: The template image or backup image for the LXC

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.LXC.Password
Parameters.Label: LXC Root Password
Parameters.HelpText: This will be the root password once the LXC container has been created

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.LXC.Storage
Parameters.Label: LXC Storage
Parameters.HelpText: Where the rootfs for this LXC will be stored.

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.LXC.Network
Parameters.Label: LXC Networks
Parameters.HelpText:
The list of network connections this LXC has. Each network connection on a new line.


`name=<name>,bridge=<bridge>,firewall=<0|1>,gw=<IPv4>,ip=<IPv4/CIDR|dhcp|manual>`


More Info: [https://pve.proxmox.com/pve-docs/api-viewer/#/nodes/{node}/lxc](https://pve.proxmox.com/pve-docs/api-viewer/#/nodes/{node}/lxc)

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.LXC.Cores
Parameters.Label: LXC CPU Cores
Parameters.HelpText: The amount of CPU cores the LXC is assigned

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.LXC.Memory
Parameters.Label: LXC Memory
Parameters.HelpText: The amount of Memory the LXC is assigned.

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.LXC.RootSize
Parameters.Label: LXC Rootfs Size
Parameters.HelpText: The size of the root volume for this LXC, Size is in GB

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.LXC.StartOnCreate
Parameters.Label: LXC Start Once Created
Parameters.HelpText: Should the LXC start once the LXC has been created

Parameters.Name: Proxmox.LXC.Force
Parameters.Label: LXC Overwrite Container
Parameters.HelpText: Overwrites an existing LXC with the same VMID
